name: Fluffy Birds HD
description:
Calling all bird watchers! Fluffy Birds is now available in High Definition! Shift and slide these cute little birds to make rows of 3 or more like-colored birds and set them free from this high wire adventure. If you enjoy the classic match three puzzle games, Fluffy Birds is just for you!

THREE GAME MODES

Casual – Complete your tasks and try to collect all 12 golden eggs before the timer runs out!
Relaxation – Sit back and enjoy your favorite game!
Puzzle - Challenge yourself with 20 mind bending puzzles. Can you solve them all?

COOL FEATURE

See those cute birds landing on your menu choices? Try shaking your device and see what happens! Pretty amazing, huh?

FLUFFY FEATURES

* Hours of match three and puzzle fun!
* 3 different game modes: Casual, Relaxation and Puzzle
* 20 different mind-bending puzzles
* Cute and cuddly artwork with Retina display support
* Game Center leaderboards and achievements
* Interactive menus
* HD Version for iPad available

More exciting card and puzzle games by GameDuell:

•Bubble Speed (free & fully optimized for iPad)
•Cleopatra´s Pyramid (free for iPhone)
•Cleopatra´s Pyramid HD (paid & fully optimized for iPad)
•Solitaire Harmony (free for iPhone)
•Jungle Jewels (paid for iPhone)
•Jungle Jewels HD (paid & fully optimized for iPad)
•Maya Pyramid (paid for iPhone)

Do you have a question or suggestion? Then send us an email message to iphone-support@gameduell.com or visit our support site at https://gameduell.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/sections/200313806-Fluffy-on-Mobile. We’d love to hear from you as we’re constantly looking at new ways to improve and develop the game.

Please remember to rate us ***** to keep the updates coming! Thanks for playing Fluffy Birds HD!
